title: Tesco Entertainment font
content:
Hi all,

I am trying to find the font that was used in the entertainment wording for the tesco entertainment text found here:

[http://www.tescos.co.uk/entertainment/](http://web.archive.org/web/20091003024242/http:/www.tescos.co.uk/entertainment/ "http://www.tescos.co.uk/entertainment/")

Thanks  
Lee
author: reboot

comments.content:
Created for Tesco By Dalton Maag and called... Tesco.

[http://www.daltonmaag.com/browse/custom/clients/tesco](http://web.archive.org/web/20091003024242/http:/www.daltonmaag.com/browse/custom/clients/tesco "http://www.daltonmaag.com/browse/custom/clients/tesco")

If you need an alternative, there are similarities in [FF Transit](http://web.archive.org/web/20091003024242/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/fontfont/ff_transit_print/) and [Vialog](http://web.archive.org/web/20091003024242/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/linotype/vialog_ot_std_virtual/).
